s: For just under $20, I feel it is a fair price. I tested it for accuracy with a 25lbs dumbbell and it was pretty close. I tested it several times, on different parts of the floor to make sure it was level and it either gave me a 24.4lbs or 24.6lbs weight reading.

t: What is item dimensional weight on Amazon? How to calculate it?
s: Example of calculation of large and light goods: Length - 20 inchesWidth - 20 inches Height - 4 inches Weight - 0.5 pounds DIM = (20 x 20 x 4) / 139 = 5,76 pounds An dimensional weight of 5.76 pounds will be taken into account when calculating shipping charges. ...
